Name: Sacred Cubes 2
About the game: A logic game with many exciting levels of varying difficulty. The world of sacred cubes was attacked by monsters and only you can stop them. Use different spells and fight back your enemies! Solve puzzles with different cubes and go to the end. There are tons of unique blocks and levels waiting for you in Sacred Cubes 2, so complete them all! Features: - Various levels - Physics - Colorful graphics
